DESCRIPTION: Alice can control #yDolls, helping her in battle. NL #yDolls have various functions.
Put a #yDoll in a #gspecific slot. NL If there is already a #yDoll, #yRecycle it before placing the new one.
Remove a #yDoll, and may trigger some special effects.
#gExtra effects triggered when played on a #yDoll .
After being played, let a random Attack in your hand gain #b2 bonus base damage, and gain #yRevelation effect.
After being played, let all Attacks in your hand gain #b2 bonus base damage, and gain #yRevelation+ effect.
Phantom cards are removed when leaving your hand or at the end of turn, #rnot entering Exhaust pile. NL Phantom cards are not counted when checking for duplicates.
Pay extra energy for its effect when you have enough [E] .
#yBlock is not removed at the start of your turn for several turns.
At the end of your turn, #yRetain up to several cards.
Special Doll - #rAttacker (4) NL #yPassive #y- #yMelancholy : #gPoison will trigger an additional time at the start of enemy turn. NL #yAct : Apply #b3 #gPoison to a random enemy.

Common Doll - #rAttacker (4) NL #yPassive #y- #yCrescent : When #yPlaced , automatically #yActs once. Shanghai Doll's damage can be buffed by #yStrength. NL #yAct : Deal #b4 damage to the enemy with lowest HP.
Common Doll - #rAttacker (8) NL #yPassive #y- #yStrewing : Whenever healed overflowed HP, deal equal amount of damage to ALL enemies. NL #yAct : Heal half of current max HP.
Advanced Doll - #gSupport (4) NL #yPassive #y- #yMountains : When #yRecycled, gain [E]. NL #yAct : Draw 1 card.

Advanced Doll - #gSupport (3) NL #yPassive #y- #yCompass : Provides #b1 #yStrength and #yDexterity for Alice. When #yPlacing other Dutch Dolls, let this #yAct #b2 times #rinstead . NL #yAct : Alternately increase the amount of Strength or Dexterity in Passive by #b1 .

Advanced Doll - #bTank (10) NL #yPassive #y- #yStar #ySand : At the start of your turn, set #yBlock of this equal to Alice. NL #yAct : Move to a slot which can't bear enemies' damage, then gain #b5 #yBlock. NL Will not move to a slot already containing a France Doll.
